name: Camus Disruptive
description:
Introducing the major players within the ranks of Generatives and Disruptives at Gormenghast.

Camus Disruptive – one of the old guard in the order of Disruptives, Camus’ timeline stretches an aeon and he is the structure for which the life force of the Disruptive collective relies on. As such, it is extremely important that Camus is protected at all costs.

He has a large army around him at, usually, all times. 

And there are a few who know his vital life-force and its weakness for a blue mould-like substance; not all of them are Disruptives.

PNG 4800 x 4800 || December 12th 2021 || Dark Art digital painting – expanding the Gormenghast origin universe
